extension.summary: Plays random videos from all sorts of lists.
extension.description: This script can select and play random episodes from TV shows, movies from genres/sets/years/tags, and videos from playlists, the filesystem, plugins (generally), and just about anything else.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on does not add functionality on its own and must be supported by skins or other add-ons. Try the Context item 'Play Random Videos' add-on for quick access from the context menu.
